items.content_html: TaskHub is a lightweight and intuitive task management app designed to help you organize, prioritize, and complete your tasks efficiently. Whether you're managing personal to-dos, work projects, or team collaborations, TaskHub offers a seamless experience with powerful features that keep you on track.

items.content_html: Weather App is a simple and responsive web application that allows users to search and view real-time weather information for any city around the world. It provides current temperature, weather conditions, humidity, and wind speed using data from the OpenWeather API. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this app is lightweight, easy to use.

It provides current temperature, weather conditions, humidity, and wind speed using data from the OpenWeather API.  Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this app is lightweight, easy to use.
